duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintains proficient knowledge of EDC functionality for training and user acceptance testing.
Establishes and maintains relationships with site data & regulatory coordinators.
Responsible for Quality Control of submitted Case Report Forms (CRFs) including source document verification and issuing queries.
Acts as an Evaluator for the internal Clinical Research Coordinator in training.
Maintains regulatory documentation for all assigned sites and study staff.
Responsible for site creation within the EDC of newly onboarded sites.
Performs QC audits of the clinical database.
Works closely with onsite team to confirm appropriate consenting is being performed and documented prior to data abstraction.
Communicates effectively with the research team, investigator(s), study sponsor, and ancillary staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, Research Coordinator Certification preferred (SoCRA, ACRP)
